body: @asunaxkirito143 the first 3 seasons were kinda trash too if you think about it. the only reason people think they're good is cuz of the epic fight scenes and the seasons after that just happened to be worse. monty was an epic dude but he barely did shit when it came to writing the shows plot

RWBY fandom? Never heard of it. I think every fandom in existence is just trash tbh. You dont know just how much I cringe whenever I see an Aot, Mha fan...etc. Oh look I'm hating them just like how people hate Fortnite and Minecraft fandom!!! How cool is that?
Well, well... An Ozpin x Glynda Doujin in here of all places? A rare sight considering the overall blight that is the RWBY fandom. Too bad it's too short.
